description: ICMR invites online applications to fill up 04 (four) vacancies of Scientist-D (Medical) in Level 12 of Pay Matrix (Rs.78,800-2,09,200) (7th CPC Scale) and usual allowances as admissible to ICMR employees for appointment on regular basis under Direct Recruitment with all India transfer liability under the Council.
qualifications: MBBS or equivalent degree recognized by MCI/NMC
desirable: MD/MS or equivalent degree recognized by MCI/NMC or MPH from a recognized university OR Ph.D. from a recognized University in subject as given in Annexure-1 AND Experience in Clinical/ Public Health Research

description: ICMR invites online applications to fill up 01 (one) vacancy of Scientist-D (Non-Medical) in Level 12 of Pay Matrix (Rs.78,800-2,09,200) (7th CPC Scale) and usual allowances as admissible to ICMR employees for appointment on regular basis under Direct Recruitment with all India transfer liability under the Council.
qualifications: Masters from a recognized university in any of the subject(s) as given in Annexure-I
desirable: Ph.D. from a recognized University in any of the subject(s) as given in Annexure-I AND Experience in Research & Development related to Biomedical Sciences, relevant to the job requirement (Biomedical Research) in a Govt./ Public Sector/ Pvt Institutions

job_title: Project Research Scientist-I (Medical) - ICMR Flu Vaccine Study
description: The study evaluates the effect of flu and pneumococcal vaccinations in people 60 years and above in the reduction of all cause mortality. This is a randomised controlled trial. Coordination and Supervision of the research team, Participant recruitment, Data-collection and data entry, Follow-up of participants, Report preparation, IEC related work.
qualifications: MBBS MD/ MPH, Preferably Community Health / Family medicine

job_title: Project Technical Support -III - ICMR PPBC Project
description: The project aims at investigating genomic, transcriptomic and spatial microenvironment and devise strategies for clinical decision to identify poor prognostic markers in pancreatic cancer. Assist in project activities related to the research study.

job_title: Project Technical Support - III - ICMR AMSP Project
description: This is an integrated m-health AMSP intervention program. Assist the Microbiology surveillance related project activities. The project aims to improve antimicrobial stewardship through mobile health interventions.
qualifications: M.Sc. in Microbiology/ Biotechnology/ Life Sciences

description: For Project Research Scientist - I (Non-Medical). An therapeutic strategy for tackling drug resistant triple negative breast cancer. Research and development activities related to biomedical sciences.
qualifications: M.Sc. in Life Sciences/ Biotechnology/ Biochemistry

description: Applications are invited from highly motivated and bright candidates for the following assignment on a time-bound research project undertaken in the Amity University. Research activities related to public health and biomedical sciences.
qualifications: M.Sc. in Public Health/ Life Sciences/ Biotechnology

description: Biological significance of disease specific sialo glycosylation in cancer. Research activities related to glycobiology and cancer research. Candidates should be CSIR-UGC NET qualified or equivalent with 2 years research experience.
qualifications: M.Sc. in Life Sciences/ Biotechnology/ Biochemistry

description: Candidate must have experience in project management. Applications are invited from highly motivated and bright candidates for the following assignment on a time-bound research project. Research and project management activities.
qualifications: M.Sc./ M.Phil/ Ph.D. in Life Sciences/ Public Health

description: One year or up to the termination of the project. Decipher cortical functioning during retinal degeneration to develop better therapeutic strategies for vision restoration. Research activities related to neuroscience and vision research.
qualifications: M.Sc. in Life Sciences/ Neuroscience/ Biotechnology
